sermons.title: The Two Final Calls

sermons.description: â€œTODAY, IF YOU HEAR HIS VOICE, DO NOT HARDEN YOUR HEARTSâ€ (Hebrews 3:15). In this sermon, Mike explains why God says â€œTODAY,â€ instead of tomorrow or next year. He explains four facts that cause God to say that today is the day to give your life to Him.
